message.content:
Sure, here is how you can use Flexbox to align your `div` elements to the right: ```css /* This will apply the style to all direct children of .container */ .container > div { display: flex; /* this makes it a flex container */ justify-content: flex-end; /* this aligns items to the end (right) */ } ``` In your HTML, you would have something like this: ```html
...
``` Remember to replace `.container` with your actual container's class name and adjust as necessary for your specific use case.
